title: Around me in Wikidata
headline: What's to see here?
description: Discover what's around you! Which buildings or institutions are within walking distance (i.e. approximately 500m)? What are some notable locations, streets, or stations around me? What does Wikipedia have to say about them?
technical-description:
Find things that are located near you according to Wikidata. Built with Chantek by Hay Kranen. Also built with Bootstrap, Ladda UI for Bootstrap 3, Modernizr, and JQuery. Localization with i18next.

All data comes from Wikidata and is queried with WikidataQuery.

This application works with modern browsers that support HTML5 Geolocation and Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS).
